item.description:
One of the most elegant places for an evening cocktail is the Museum of Fine Arts. Enjoy live music outside in the Calderwood Courtyard.

Dress to impress.

Music by DJ Deja

I'll be outside the side entrance until 5:20 but must go in at the start in order to get a table. There will be a small sign (of the Renoir painting) on the table. Hopefully no one will miss us this time.

Free admission for MFA Members
Otherwise, Free with Museum admission ($17.00)

Note: Every Wednesday from 4-9:45 pm admission is free (voluntary donations welcome); Guests also are entitled to one free repeat visit within ten days.
item.name: MFA Summer Fridays: Dancing & Art
